title: Search File Contents
description: Learn to search inside files for specific text or patterns. Find where functions are defined, where variables are used, and more.

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Search File Contents

Find the TODO comments hidden in this codebase.

## Objectives
1. Find all TODO comments
2. Create a todo-list.md with what you found

hints.text: Ask Claude Code to search for 'TODO' in all files.
Try: 'Search for TODO comments in this project and list them'
Ask: 'Find all TODO comments in the codebase and create todo-list.md documenting each one with its file location'

solution.approach: Use content search to find patterns across files.
solution.example: Search for 'TODO' in all files and create todo-list.md with the findings
alternativeApproaches: Find all TODO comments and document them
Grep for TODO across the codebase

learningPoints: Claude Code can search file contents, not just names
Pattern matching works across multiple files
Combining search with documentation is powerful
